attributes.action: Have all school holidays on the same dates except training days
attributes.additional_details: Have all school holidays on the same dates except training days.To allow parents to taken holidays at those times and not have to take extra weeks off were their children are at different schools. Also allow children and parents to have holidays at the same time. Allowing parents and children to share holidays and go to events etc at the same time. Also allowing events and companies targeted at children to have clear dates when all children are off school. This would allow more cooperation between schools and groups attracting children from different schools.
